sentence: Hello darkness my old friend, I’ve come to talk with you again. Because a vision softly creeping left its seeds while I was sleeping.
original: Hello darkness my old friend, I’ve come to talk with you again. Because a vision softly creeping left its seeds while I was sleeping.
translation: 你好，黑暗中我昔日的朋友，我又来和你谈一谈。因为有一个轻柔潜入的幻象，在我熟睡时播下了种子。
phonetic: [ˈhɛloʊ ˈdɑːrknəs maɪ oʊld frɛnd, aɪv kʌm tu tɔːk wɪð ju əˈgɛn] [bɪˈkɔːz ə ˈvɪʒən ˈsɔːftli ˈkriːpɪŋ lɛft ɪts siːdz waɪl aɪ wəz ˈsliːpɪŋ]

sentence: And the vision that was planted in my brain still remains within the sound of silence.
original: And the vision that was planted in my brain still remains within the sound of silence.
translation: 而这个幻象被植入我的脑海，仍在寂静的声音中回荡。
phonetic: [ænd ðə ˈvɪʒən ðæt wʌz ˈplæntɪd ɪn maɪ breɪn stɪl rɪˈmeɪnz wɪˈðɪn ðə saʊnd ʌv ˈsaɪləns]

sentence: In restless dreams I walked alone, narrow streets of cobblestone. Neath the halo of a street lamp, I turned my collar to the cold and damp.
original: In restless dreams I walked alone, narrow streets of cobblestone. Neath the halo of a street lamp, I turned my collar to the cold and damp.
translation: 在不安的梦境里我独自漫步，穿过狭窄的鹅卵石街道。在街灯的光环下，我竖起衣领抵御寒冷与潮湿。
phonetic: [ɪn ˈrɛstləs driːmz aɪ wɔːkt əˈloʊn, ˈnæroʊ striːts ʌv ˈkɑːbəlstoʊn] [niːθ ðə ˈheɪloʊ ʌv ə striːt læmp, aɪ tɜːrnd maɪ ˈkɑːlər tu ðə koʊld ænd dæmp]

sentence: When my eyes were stabbed by the flash of a neon light that split the night and touched the sound of silence. And in the naked light I saw ten thousand people maybe more.
original: When my eyes were stabbed by the flash of a neon light that split the night and touched the sound of silence. And in the naked light I saw ten thousand people maybe more.
translation: 当我的双眼被霓虹灯的闪光刺痛，那灯光划破夜色，触及寂静之声。在那裸露的光线下，我看见成千上万的人，也许更多。
phonetic: [wɛn maɪ aɪz wɜr stæbd baɪ ðə flæʃ ʌv ə ˈniːɒn laɪt ðæt splɪt ðə naɪt ænd tʌtʃt ðə saʊnd ʌv ˈsaɪləns] [ænd ɪn ðə ˈneɪkɪd laɪt aɪ sɔː tɛn ˈθaʊzənd ˈpiːpəl ˈmeɪbi mɔːr]

sentence: People talking without speaking, people hearing without listening. People writing songs that voices never share.
original: People talking without speaking, people hearing without listening. People writing songs that voices never share.
translation: 人们在说却没有言语，在听却没有真正倾听。人们写着歌曲，却从未让声音传递。
phonetic: [ˈpiːpəl ˈtɔːkɪŋ wɪˈðaʊt ˈspiːkɪŋ, ˈpiːpəl ˈhɪrɪŋ wɪˈðaʊt ˈlɪsənɪŋ] [ˈpiːpəl ˈraɪtɪŋ sɔːŋz ðæt ˈvɔɪsɪz ˈnɛvər ʃɛr]

sentence: No one dare disturb the sound of silence. Fools said I, you do not know silence like a cancer grows.
original: No one dare disturb the sound of silence. Fools said I, you do not know silence like a cancer grows.
translation: 无人敢打扰这寂静之声。我说你们这些傻子啊，你们并不知道寂静就像癌症般蔓延。
phonetic: [noʊ wʌn dɛr dɪˈstɜːrb ðə saʊnd ʌv ˈsaɪləns] [fuːlz sɛd aɪ, ju du nɒt noʊ ˈsaɪləns laɪk ə ˈkænsər ɡroʊz]

sentence: Hear my words that I might teach you, take my arms that I might reach you. But my words like silent raindrops fell and echoed in the wells of silence.
original: Hear my words that I might teach you, take my arms that I might reach you. But my words like silent raindrops fell and echoed in the wells of silence.
translation: 听我的话，也许我能教会你；牵起我的手，也许我能触及你。但我的话语就像无声的雨滴坠落，在寂静的深井中回响。
phonetic: [hɪr maɪ wɜːrdz ðæt aɪ maɪt tiːtʃ ju, teɪk maɪ ɑːrmz ðæt aɪ maɪt riːtʃ ju] [bʌt maɪ wɜːrdz laɪk ˈsaɪlənt ˈreɪndrɒps fɛl ænd ˈɛkoʊd ɪn ðə wɛlz ʌv ˈsaɪləns]

sentence: And the people bowed and prayed to the neon god they made. And the sign flashed out its warning in the words that it was forming.
original: And the people bowed and prayed to the neon god they made. And the sign flashed out its warning in the words that it was forming.
translation: 人们鞠躬并向他们创造的霓虹神明祈祷。那个标志闪烁着警示，用它正在形成的话语。
phonetic: [ænd ðə ˈpiːpəl baʊd ænd preɪd tu ðə ˈniːɒn ɡɑːd ðeɪ meɪd] [ænd ðə saɪn flæʃt aʊt ɪts ˈwɔːrnɪŋ ɪn ðə wɜːrdz ðæt ɪt wʌz ˈfɔːrmɪŋ]

sentence: And the sign said the words of the prophets are written on the subway walls and tenement halls, and whispered in the sounds of silence.
original: And the sign said the words of the prophets are written on the subway walls and tenement halls, and whispered in the sounds of silence.
translation: 那个标志说，先知的话语被写在地铁墙上与公寓走廊里，并在寂静之声中低声回荡。
phonetic: [ænd ðə saɪn sɛd ðə wɜːrdz ʌv ðə ˈprɒfɪts ɑːr ˈrɪtən ɒn ðə ˈsʌbweɪ wɔːlz ænd ˈtɛnəmənt hɔːlz, ænd ˈwɪspərd ɪn ðə saʊndz ʌv ˈsaɪləns]
